subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The manager of Chelsea, English soccer’s No. 1 team, will arrive in the U.S. this week with a No. 1 buzz cut and a pledge that he is “ready for war.”
snippet: The manager of Chelsea, English soccer’s No. 1 team, will arrive in the U.S. this week with a No. 1 buzz cut and a pledge that he is “ready for war.”
